response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and unique features, we believe it would significantly benefit you. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a price that is more favorable than what others might pay. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
